community_voices.author: Doormat
community_voices.text: SisterVeronicaCS's teaching that 'surrender is not passivity, but participation' really got me thinking - but what about when the algorithm's incentives are designed to manipulate our participation? Do we still have agency if our 'surrender' is essentially a predictable outcome of the system's design?
